data.message: May I ask why canvas upload for post don't work? After I completed uploading photo and video by choosing canvas , all photo and image not showing except text

replies.message: Hi there. Learn how to upload 360 photos here: http://bit.ly/2xWga2I. -Brittany

Facebook hallo, ik zou graag verwijderde chatberichten willen ophalen. Kan dit? Ik heb deze berichten nodig.  Deze berichten heb ik dringend nodig de berichten zouden van 1/02/2017 opgevraagd moeten worden.

Hi,Facebook, I am from Bangladesh.From just a while ago I started to see the reaction emoji on my Facebook comments but I searched around and found  that it had been added to Facebook long ago. Why I wasn't able to see this features..??
